attributes.action: Get Rid of the TV licence, make the bbc subscription
attributes.additional_details: Why pay for a TV licence to watch the BBC like many households we pay for Disney prime Paramount Netflix sky virgin We pay for a subscription to all these channels to watch why should the BBC be any different?
attributes.background: Make the BBC a subscription channel like all the others instead of getting the UK people to pay for something they don’t want or like

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701068
